mapper.select: SELECT AUTH_NO ,AUTH_NM FROM TB_BO_USR_AUTH WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS = '1' AND AUTH_TYPE = #{AUTH_TYPE} ORDER BY AUTH_NO
SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(USR_ID),0) FROM TB_BO_USR_ACCT WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #{USR_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BO_USR_ACCT (USR_ID, PSWD, USR_NM, USR_TYPE, AUTH_NO ,TEL_NO, EMAIL, STATUS, WORKER, WORKER_IP) VALUES (#{USR_ID}, #{PSWD}, #{USR_NM}, #{USR_TYPE}, ${AUTH_NO} ,#{TEL_NO}, #{EMAIL}, #{STATUS}, #{WORKER}, #{WORKER_IP})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(A.I_MID),0) AS COUNT FROM TB_BO_MER_MGMT A INNER JOIN TB_BO_USR_ACCT_MER B ON A.I_MID = B.I_MID WHERE USR_ID = #{USR_ID}

SELECT COALESCE(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(I_MID, ','), 2),' ') AS I_MID FROM( SELECT A.I_MID ,ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.I_MID) RNUM ,COUNT(*) OVER() CNT FROM TB_BO_MER_MGMT A INNER JOIN TB_BO_USR_ACCT_MER B ON A.I_MID = B.I_MID WHERE USR_ID = #{USR_ID} )WHERE RNUM = CNT START WITH RNUM = 1 CONNECT BY RNUM = PRIOR RNUM + 1

SELECT COALESCE(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(MER_NM, ','), 2),' ') AS MER_NM FROM( SELECT A.MER_NM ,ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.I_MID) RNUM ,COUNT(*) OVER() CNT FROM TB_BO_MER_MGMT A INNER JOIN TB_BO_USR_ACCT_MER B ON A.I_MID = B.I_MID WHERE USR_ID = #{USR_ID} )WHERE RNUM = CNT START WITH RNUM = 1 CONNECT BY RNUM = PRIOR RNUM + 1
